section.text: *NOTE: This section includes amendments by emergency legislation that will expire on May 1, 2024. To view the text of this section after the expiration of all emergency and temporary legislation, click this link: Permanent Version.*
section.heading: Enrollment of Council acts and resolutions.
section.text: After passage by the Council, but before any presentation to the Mayor, each act and resolution of the Council shall be set forth on parchment or other such suitable paper.

annotations.annotation: Oct. 8, 1975, D.C. Law 1-19, title II, § 206, 22 DCR 2062
Public records management, see § 2-1701 et seq.
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 3(b) of Term Clarification Emergency Amendment Act of 2024 (D.C. Act 25-385, Feb. 1, 2024, 71 DCR 1457).
